name: Dose - Tablet dose
formula: Dose = dose prescribed (mg) / dose in stock (mg/tablet)
example:
Calculate the exact amount of medication to give based on available stock. 
Example: Metronidazole 750 mg 3 times a day, available tablet 500 mg/tablet:
 Dose = 750 mg/500 mg-tab = 1.5 tablet per dose
